Oct. 10, 1999 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A) 20 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-section-a
Milham Ford School, Marston Best Instrumentalist: Stephen Clapton, Cornet, Jubilee Highest 4th Section: City of Oxford Training Highest Ungraded: East Woodhay
Presentation: 1 Pangbourne, 37 2 Jubilee, 36 3= Chinnor, 35 3= East Woodhay, 35 5 City of Oxford Training, 33
Best Percussionist of the Day: David Mackie, Pangbourne Best Tenor Horn of the Day: Penny Singleton, Chinnor Best Soprano Cornet of the Day: Helen Stevenson, Wantage Youth
Feb. 3, 2013, 1:03 p.m. March 26, 2013, 7:52 p.m.
